author: Simon Difford
description: Take one per day in the hope it will aid your health, wealth and happiness. OK, its efficacious effect is most likely to benefit the latter at a cost to your wealth and perhaps your health.
name: Efficacious
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Ferro China Baliva quinine liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
